toi.title: Government caps maximum retail price of 200ml hand sanitizer at Rs 100 till JuneThe government has capped maximum retail price of hand sanitizer at Rs 100 per 200ml bottle till June 30 this year amid sharp rise in the prices of this product amid the coronavirus oubreak. Similarly, price of a 2 ply (surgical) mask has been capped at Rs 8 and that of 3 ply (surgical) mask at Rs 10 till June 30, consumer affairs minister Ram Vilas Paswan said in a statement.

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: Kerala govt postpones all ongoing exams
indiatoday.content:
CM Pinarayi Vijayan on Friday, March 20, 2020, announced that all of the
ongoing exams have been postponed following the coronavirus outbreak.

indiatoday.title: No smoking, eat healthy: WHO Chief's guide to staying fit
indiatoday.content:
WHO Chief took to Twitter today to share a guide to staying fit during the
times of coronavirus. Hhe suggested people to say no to smoking and eat
healthy.

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus pandemic: All that happened today in India & the world
indiatoday.content:
Two persons, including a woman, become first fatalities of coronavirus
pandemic in Singapore, health ministry says.

indiatoday.title: Covid-19: UP health minister tests -ve after attending party with Kanika
indiatoday.content:
Uttar Pradesh Health Minister Jai Pratap Singh went into self-isolation after
Kanika Kapoor announced that she had tested positive for the novel
coronavirus.

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus pandemic: Nepal announces country-wide partial lockdown from March 23
indiatoday.content:
Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli announced a complete halt on long-haul
transportation services with effect from March 23 till further notice.

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus: Bangladesh shuts largest brothel over Covid-19 fears
indiatoday.content:
Daulatdia brothel on the bank of river Padma and near a major highway some
100 km west of Dhaka is the largest of the approximately 12 brothels in the
country.

indiatoday.title: Is US President Donald Trump infected with coronavirus?
indiatoday.content:
Several social media users are sharing a video of US president Trump claiming
he fainted during a speech because heâ€™s sick and infected with coronavirus.
Our #AFWA team probes the claim. #AFWAFactCheck

indiatoday.title: Maldives pledges USD 200,000 to SAARC Coronavirus Emergency Fund
indiatoday.content:
Welcoming PM Modi for creating the emergency and relief fund, Maldives
Foreign Minister Abdulla Shahid said the country will join the initiative to
tackle the challenges posed by the coronavirus pandemic.

indiatoday.title: Mary Kom breaks 14-day quarantine protocol amid coronavirus scare
indiatoday.content:
Mary Kom, who had competed in the Asia-Oceania Olympic qualifiers in Amman,
Jordan, had returned home March 13 and was supposed to be in self-isolation
for a minimum of 14 days amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.

indiatoday.title: Kerala: First case filed for violation of home quarantine code
indiatoday.content:
Police in Kasargod have booked Abdul Khader, 48, whose NRI friend recently
arrived in India and later tested positive for Covid-19. Khader went to
receive him, travelled with him and violated the home quarantine code.

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus: Indian nationals in US advised to stay safe and isolated
indiatoday.content:
In its first COVID-19 advisory for Indian nationals in the US, the embassy on
Friday urged them to stay safe and isolate themselves within their
residential premises and follow the advisories updated on the US Centers for
Disease Control (CDC).

indiatoday.title: Coronavirus: Stranded Dubai-based Indian teen finally returning home
indiatoday.content:
Her parents said they got a call from a UAE-based airlines in Frankfurt that
their daughter Miha has been accepted on the flight and they are bringing her
to Dubai.
